TopicTitle: What's with the recent posts in the wrong areas?

Articles.Content:
Recently there have been lots of posts in subforums that should be in completely different subforums, why is that happening? Here are some threads that are like this, I'm not trying to be mean but just pointing it out (some of the threads are cool):

This one was moved

as well as this one

Just wondering why there are so many out-of-place threads.

This is a common and unremarkable occurrence. I myself move perhaps 5 to 20 threads per week, and of course I'm not the only moderator. You merely seem to have been running across some of them before we get to them lately, for one reason or another.

1 minute ago, Vanamonde said:

This is a common and unremarkable occurrence. I myself move perhaps 5 to 20 threads per week, and of course I'm not the only moderator. You merely seem to have been running across some of them before we get to them lately, for one reason or another. 

Huh, interesting. I thought I would see more, that's all.

Oh, jeez. Guys, rather than clutter up the threads with remarks which may offend the OP, how about just hitting the report button when you come across something that seems to be in the wrong place? 

Off to do some tidying...
